name: get_tides_for_a_station
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool noaa_tides.
Tool description: United States NOAA tide height and time predictions in JSON format.
API description: Retrieves tide information for a specified station ID on a given date using the RapidAPI NOAA Tides service.

is_id.description: The ID of the tide station to get information for.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve tide information in YYYYMMDD format. Defaults to '20220625'.
